darkhistory.electrons.ics.ics_spectrum.nonrel_spec_quad¶

darkhistory.electrons.ics.ics_spectrum.nonrel_spec_quad(eleckineng_arr, photeng_arr, T, spec_type='new')¶

Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum of secondary photons using quadrature.

Parameters:
  • eleckineng (ndarray) – Incoming electron kinetic energy.
  • photeng (ndarray) – Outgoing photon energy.
  • T (float) – CMB temperature.
  • spec_type ({'old', 'new'}) – Choice of secondary photon spectrum to use.
Returns:

dN/(dt dE) of the outgoing photons (dt = 1 s), with abscissa photeng.
Return type:

ndarray

Note

Insert note on the suitability of the method.
